page.title: 11ST ANDREWS JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is on Waterloo Road, it was opened on the 14th September, 1973. Next to our school is a church. The church is called St Martin's and was opened in 1831. The school has 10 classrooms and it is made of brick. The houses around the school are mostly terraced houses. There is a pub called The Crown and this is about 400 yards from the school. Next to the school is a fire station and an ambulance station. Sometimes the firemen have games of football which we can watch. There are two fire trucks and three fire engines and about six ambulances. There is a library next to the church and it is built out of stone.
